title: Evan's Girlfriend
body:
Evan's Girlfriend

Six hours later....

Evan can be seen walking toward the academy. Every person who saw Evan stepped aside and didn't dare to come near him.

Where ever Evan went people quickly walked away from there not wanting to stand near him.

People were avoiding Evan like he was a plague.

Evan didn't care about people and continued to walk toward the academy. His face was lifeless and he was releasing an extrema aura of depression and poverty.

His depression aura was so strong that it was leaking out and whoever saw him doesn't want to come near him.

Remembering what happened to him a few hours ago Evan felt his heart is about to burst and he wanted to die.

Evan's lifeless eyes were looking at his phone screen that was showing his bank balance.

Just a few hours ago he had hundreds of thousands of credits, but currently, his bank balance was showing just 3000 credits.

"Why?" Evan muttered in a depressed voice, "Why is this happening to me?"
